name: Creating a contdown timer
content: function countdownTimer(minutes) { let seconds = minutes * 60; const countdown = setInterval(function() { seconds--; if (seconds < 0) { clearInterval(countdown); } else { console.log(seconds + " seconds left"); } }, 1000); }

name: Merge two or more lists into a list of lists
content: def merge(*args, missing_val = None): #missing_val will be used when one of the smaller lists is shorter tham the others. #Get the maximum length within the smaller lists. max_length = max([len(lst) for lst in args]) outList = [] for i in range(max_length): result.append([args[k][i] if i < len(args[k]) else missing_val for k in range(len(args))]) return outList

name: Fibonacci function
description: The best way (not exactly) to create fibonacci sequence
content: // program to generate fibonacci series up to a certain number // take input from the user const number = parseInt(prompt('Enter a positive number: ')); let n1 = 0, n2 = 1, nextTerm; console.log('Fibonacci Series:'); console.log(n1); // print 0 console.log(n2); // print 1 nextTerm = n1 + n2; while (nextTerm <= number) { // print the next term console.log(nextTerm); n1 = n2; n2 = nextTerm; nextTerm = n1 + n2; }
